This is what you work for. You work hard to get in this position. I'm ecstatic to be here. Michael Vick was selected to start Sunday after leading the NFC with more than 1.5 million votes, far ahead of Minnesota Vikings running back href="http://www.tsn.ca/nfl/teams/players/?name=Adrian Peterson+Adrian Peterson"> Adrian Peterson , the NFC's second-leading vote-getter at 948,410.
